summary: Two college students share a ride home for the holidays, but when they break down on a deserted stretch of road, they are preyed upon by the ghosts of people who have died there.
cast: Emily Blunt|Ashton Holmes|Martin Donovan|Ned Bellamy|Ian A. Wallace|Donny Lucas|Chelan Simmons|Darren Moore|Linden Banks|Caz Odin Darko|Heath Horejda|Ian Thompson
title: Escalofríos
